description: System-generated unique identifier for this attachment-to-entity linkage record (primary key).
Identifier of the attachment being linked; foreign key to the attachment/file metadata record.
Code indicating the target entity or linkage context for the attachment. Controlled values; likely system-defined; confirm with SME.
User ID of the person or process that created the linkage record.
Timestamp when the linkage record was created; check system timezone/precision.
User ID of the person or process that last modified the linkage record.
Timestamp when the linkage record was last modified.
Status of the linkage record (e.g., active/inactive) represented as a single-character flag; confirm allowed values with SME.
Indicator whether this attachment should print together with its related document or transaction; boolean flag.
Indicator whether a thumbnail or preview image should be generated or shown for the attachment; boolean flag.
